thread.title: BRIEF-J2 Global Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $1.02

title: BRIEF-J2 Global Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $1.02
text:
35 PM / in 5 minutes BRIEF-J2 Global Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $1.02 Reuters Staff 
Feb 6 (Reuters) - J2 Global Inc: 
* J2 GLOBAL REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR END 2017 RESULTS AND PROVIDES 2018 OUTLOOK * Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.79 * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.02 
* SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $5.95 TO $6.25 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $1.2 BILLION TO $1.25 BILLION * Q4 REVENUE $316.4 MILLION VERSUS $251.8 MILLION 
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.79, REVENUE VIEW $319.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $6.06, REVENUE VIEW $1.19 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* J2 GLOBAL - APPROVED QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND OF $0.405 PER SHARE, A 2.5% INCREASE VERSUS LAST QUARTERâ€˜S DIVIDEND Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
